titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: A AND E STREAM - Description

div.p: This records the streaming classification assigned to an Accident and Emergency Attendance, within an Accident and Emergency Department. Streaming is a system whereby PATIENTS are allocated to different flows according to their needs. These flows are individually staffed and continue to function whatever the pressures in other streams. Within any stream, at any one time, there may be PATIENTS with different A AND E INITIAL ASSESSMENT TRIAGE CATEGORIES. An Accident and Emergency Department will have either simple streaming or full streaming in place and will use the appropriate classification.
